1: הַ֥לְלוּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>Praise</n> יָ֨הּ ׀ <sup>3050 </sup> <n>ye the LORD</n> אוֹדֶ֣ה <sup>3034 </sup> <n>I will praise</n> יְ֭הוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> לֵבָ֑ב <sup>3824 </sup> <n>with [my] whole heart</n> בְּס֖וֹד <sup>5475 </sup> <n>in the assembly</n> יְשָׁרִ֣ים <sup>3477 </sup> <n>of the upright</n> וְעֵדָֽה׃ <sup>5712 </sup> <n>and [in] the congregation</n>
2: גְּ֭דֹלִים <sup>1419 </sup> <n>[are] great</n> מַעֲשֵׂ֣י <sup>4639 </sup> <n>The works</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> דְּ֝רוּשִׁ֗ים <sup>1875 </sup> <n>sought out</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> חֶפְצֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>2656 </sup> <n>of all them that have pleasure</n>
3: הוֹד־ <sup>1935 </sup> <n>[is] honourable</n> וְהָדָ֥ר <sup>1926 </sup> <n>and glorious</n> פָּֽעֳל֑וֹ <sup>6467 </sup> <n>His work</n> וְ֝צִדְקָת֗וֹ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>and his righteousness</n> עֹמֶ֥דֶת <sup>5975 </sup> <n>endureth</n> לָעַֽד׃ <sup>5703 </sup> <n>for ever</n>
4: זֵ֣כֶר <sup>2143 </sup> <n>to be remembered</n> עָ֭שָׂה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>He hath made</n> לְנִפְלְאֹתָ֑יו <sup>6381 </sup> <n>his wonderful works</n> חַנּ֖וּן <sup>2587 </sup> <n>[is] gracious</n> וְרַח֣וּם <sup>7349 </sup> <n>and full of compassion</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n>
5: טֶ֭רֶף <sup>2964 </sup> <n>meat</n> נָתַ֣ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>He hath given</n> לִֽירֵאָ֑יו <sup>3373 </sup> <n>unto them that fear</n> יִזְכֹּ֖ר <sup>2142 </sup> <n>be mindful</n> לְעוֹלָ֣ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>him he will ever</n> בְּרִיתֽוֹ׃ <sup>1285 </sup> <n>of his covenant</n>
6: כֹּ֣חַ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>the power</n> מַ֭עֲשָׂיו <sup>4639 </sup> <n>of his works</n> הִגִּ֣יד <sup>5046 </sup> <n>He hath shewed</n> לְעַמּ֑וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>his people</n> לָתֵ֥ת <sup>5414 </sup> <n>that he may give</n> לָ֝הֶ֗ם נַחֲלַ֥ת <sup>5159 </sup> <n>them the heritage</n> גּוֹיִֽם׃ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>of the heathen</n>
7: מַעֲשֵׂ֣י <sup>4639 </sup> <n>The works</n> יָ֭דָיו <sup>3027 </sup> <n>of his hands</n> אֱמֶ֣ת <sup>571 </sup> <n>[are] verity</n> וּמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>and judgment</n> נֶ֝אֱמָנִ֗ים <sup>539 </sup> <n>[are] sure</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> פִּקּוּדָֽיו׃ <sup>6490 </sup> <n>all his commandments</n>
8: סְמוּכִ֣ים <sup>5564 </sup> <n>They stand fast</n> לָעַ֣ד <sup>5703 </sup> <n>for ever</n> לְעוֹלָ֑ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>and ever</n> עֲ֝שׂוּיִ֗ם <sup>6213 </sup> <n>[and are] done</n> בֶּאֱמֶ֥ת <sup>571 </sup> <n>in truth</n> וְיָשָֽׁר׃ <sup>3477 </sup> <n>and uprightness</n>
9: פְּד֤וּת ׀ <sup>6304 </sup> <n>redemption</n> שָׁ֘לַ֤ח <sup>7971 </sup> <n>He sent</n> לְעַמּ֗וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>unto his people</n> צִוָּֽה־ <sup>6680 </sup> <n>he hath commanded</n> לְעוֹלָ֥ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>for ever</n> בְּרִית֑וֹ <sup>1285 </sup> <n>his covenant</n> קָד֖וֹשׁ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>holy</n> וְנוֹרָ֣א <sup>3372 </sup> <n>and reverend</n> שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>[is] his name</n>
10: רֵ֘אשִׁ֤ית <sup>7225 </sup> <n>[is] the beginning</n> חָכְמָ֨ה ׀ <sup>2451 </sup> <n>of wisdom</n> יִרְאַ֬ת <sup>3374 </sup> <n>The fear</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> שֵׂ֣כֶל <sup>7922 </sup> <n>understanding</n> ט֭וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>a good</n> לְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>have all</n> עֹשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <sup>6213 </sup> <n>have all they that do</n> תְּ֝הִלָּת֗וֹ <sup>8416 </sup> <n>[his commandments] his praise</n> עֹמֶ֥דֶת <sup>5975 </sup> <n>endureth</n> לָעַֽד׃ <sup>5703 </sup> <n>for ever</n>
